urlInputPlaceholder: Enter VS Code theme JSON URL...
fetchUrlError: Failed to fetch or parse theme from URL
instructionsStep1: Upload a VS Code theme JSON file or fetch it from a URL.
instructionsStep2: Click 'Convert & Download' and save the .xccolortheme file to this folder:
instructionsStep3: Restart Xcode for the theme to appear in Preferences > Themes.
instructionsStep4: Restart Xcode and select the new theme in Preferences > Fonts & Colors.
disclaimerText: Conversion might not be perfect due to differences between VS Code and Xcode theme capabilities. Semantic highlighting rules might require manual adjustments.
appSubtitle: Easily convert your favorite VS Code themes to Xcode format
uploadAreaDescription: Drag & drop a .json or .jsonc file here, or click to select
